message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a decent amount, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
Let's be a little more reasonable this time. A 60/40 split is a good starting point. We can both get a good chunk of the money, and we can avoid further losses due to inflation.
You should have taken the first offer, now it's time to pay the price!

I understand you're playing hardball, but we both have to be willing to compromise.  I'm offering a 75/25 split. It's better than the previous offers, and we can still both walk away with something significant.
You're running out of time, and I'm not getting any softer. Take it or leave it!
We're both losing money with each passing round. I'm willing to go up to 1500 for myself, but I need you to be reasonable. We're both better off with a deal than with nothing at all.
You're getting desperate, and I'm not going to go easy on you. This is my final offer!
Alice, we're both losing money here. I'm offering a 90/10 split, which is more than what I've been getting. It's a chance for us to walk away with something before it's too late. Please consider it.
